title: News about unsafe oranges decreases demand, price

content.question: Which of the following would most likely result in a decrease in the equilibrium price of oranges?

choices.label: The weather during this orange-growing season is not as good as it was last year.
The price of apples, a substitute for oranges, is higher this year than last year.
New studies suggest that oranges contain traces of cancer-causing substances due to pesticide residue.
A tree-killing fungus spreads through orange orchards across the country.
Firms in the orange industry launch an effective advertising campaign.

content.answer: New studies suggest that oranges contain traces of cancer-causing substances due to pesticide residue.

topic.text: 2.7: Market Disequilibrium and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
